item.description:
The third Tuesday of the month is soon approaching! This month we are meeting at The Burren in Davis Square.
- How about that election, eh?
- Politics not your thing and just want to hang out?
- Keep your calendar free for a movie meetup at the end of November to go see the new Lincoln movie: http://www.thelincolnmovie.com/


Either way, come on out!

* * Cross-posted at Facebook * *
https://www.facebook.com/events/168222123301509/

The monthly meetup is a casual gathering to give us MA Republicans/Conservatives/Libertarians/etc (anything on the right!) an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees, men and women of all ages!

Come whenever you can (we're usually there for a few hours) for a drink or dinner, or simply for the conversation. As always, there's NO AGENDA, so feel free to talk politics, current events, jobs, sports, vacation plans, movies...

First timers are always welcome! Feel free to walk right in and introduce yourself to someone. Worried about how to find us? Call or text my cell: (617) 784-7764.

Hope you can make it! Bring your friends!
item.name: Boston Young Republican November Meetup
